attributes.action: Stop YES loans from taking £69.50 fees from vulnerable people
attributes.additional_details:
Please sign this petition.
Yes loans take £69.50 fee for loans they cannot provide,some are vulnerable people who find it hard to make ends meet.They are then mistreated by being put on hold when they try to find out how the loans application is progressing.There will be NO loans for the majority of these apllicants. Please help me make the government debate this scrupulous company,and stop them charging upfront fees until a loan is issued.
